conclusion: Analyze the v-t graph to determine collision time.
v-t graph with lines A and B; A starts at 25 m/s, B at 15 m/s, both decrease linearly to zero.
Problem involves two cars braking simultaneously; collision occurs when both have zero velocity.
Identify point where both lines intersect the time axis.
Line A intersects x-axis at approximately 30 seconds.
Line B intersects x-axis at approximately 20 seconds.
Cars collide when both have zero velocity, at intersection on x-axis.
Both cars reach zero velocity at the same time, before 20 seconds.
Cars collide before 20 seconds of braking.
